title: Topic 003 Question 061
body: You plan to use Power BI to create sales invoices for customers. The solution must meet the following requirements:
•	Sales invoices must be exported in a PDF format.
•	The PDF exports must show all columns and rows clearly.
options: a paginated report that contains a tablix
a dashboard that contains a table
an interactive report that contains a table
an interactive report that contains a matrix
